stanzas: My name is Nathan Thimothe, and I am currently an Software Engineer at Amazon working on mobile authentication! I have professional experience in Java, Kotlin, Objective-C, Swift, Go, TypeScript, and JavaScript.
Recently, I've helped launch Passkeys at Amazon, a feature that allows users to conveniently and securely sign in to their Amazon accounts without a paassword!
Outside of work, I really enjoy learning new languages, reading, and listening to podcasts.
